snippet: In a letter to the New York Fed and the Federal Reserve Board in Washington, Senator Sherrod Brown challenged the regulators to defend their response to the rate-rigging scandal.
abstract: In a letter to the New York Fed and the Federal Reserve Board in Washington, Senator Sherrod Brown challenged the regulators to defend their response to the rate-rigging scandal.

headline.main: New York Fed Faces New Scrutiny on Rate-Rigging Scandal

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
